snippet: New rules from the S.E.C. will expose investors to more fraud.
abstract: Editorial contends two new rules adopted by Securities and Exchange Commission all but invite hucksters, rip-off artists and other bad actors to prey on individual investors; warns rules are another disturbing sign the SEC, under leadership of new chairwoman Mary Jo White, will pursue deregulation at the expense of investor protection.
lead_paragraph: New rules from the S.E.C. will expose investors to more fraud.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Private Placements (Non-Public Offerings) and Mini IPOs
